data.description:
After your request for a hearing is received, the Bureau of State Hearings will send you a scheduling notice with date and time of the hearing. This notice will be sent to you at least 10 days before the hearing and will contain information about how to participate in your hearing.

This information is also available once you log into the SHARE Portal and through the automated information available on our 866-635-3748 phone number and will contain information about how to participate in your hearing.
data.textList:
After your request for a hearing is received, the Bureau of State Hearings will send you a scheduling notice with date and time of the hearing. This notice will be sent to you at least 10 days before the hearing and will contain information about how to participate in your hearing.
This information is also available once you log into the SHARE Portal and through the automated information available on our 866-635-3748 phone number and will contain information about how to participate in your hearing.
data.title: Scheduling your hearing.
